snippet: Germany’s top cultural official announced plans for stiffer controls on the trade in art and antiquities, an area in which the nation has been seen as lax.
abstract: Germany’s top cultural official announced plans for stiffer controls on the trade in art and antiquities, an area in which the nation has been seen as lax.

headline.main: Germany Plans to Tighten Regulation of Art and Antiquities Trade
headline.print_headline: Germany to Tighten Controls on Art
